name: Dance with Death (Simex)
description:
In this Game you face off with Death himself! The stakes are as high as can be, because losing to death means... DEATH!

Use the arrow keys and time them perfectly do sick dance moves! Show Death who is boss, Do Not Go Gentle into That Good Night, disco until sunrise!

I recommend downloading the build, the online scoreboard doesn't work with the WebGL. I also recommend playing in full screen!
